predicate.note: Frames file for 'propel' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. Comparison to 'move'.

example.name: no stated destination
example.text: On the Frankfurt Stock Exchange, share prices closed higher in fairly thin trading, as selective buying by foreigners helped *trace* propel prices.

example.name: with stated destination
example.text: Computer parts are getting ever smaller, Mr. Johnson said, a shrinking that *trace* has propelled laptops into position as the fastest-growing segment of the computer business.
example.arg: position as the fastest-growing segment of the computer business
